page.title: 04New Forest-Deer and Trains
page.content:
I visited{Hawkhill}with my family and we saw some deer. We had to be very quiet otherwise the deer would not come out of the woods. The deer were brown with beige spots. We saw a lot of deer. When the trains come the deer are frightened. The engine driver of the train waved to me and sounded his horn. The train went very fast. We crossed over the railway tracks at the level crossing. We saw more deer on this side. The deer could hide from us and the trains in the trees. The trees also shade them from the sun in the summer. We had a picnic and I played games with my big brother.
Linda Corn aged 5.
